creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure standing on stern of boat with PR arm outstretched in front, and a cluster of fish on a stringer in PL hand
marks:
Label

-- in graphite on verso: PUTS | D830I
provenance: [Herman Shickman Gallery, New York, at least until 1971; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Fisherman Standing in a Boat
